text: Gavriil Bertrain (, 2 August 1869 - 25 October 1939) was a Russian fencer. He competed in three events at the 1912 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1869 births Category:1939 deaths Category:Russian male fencers Category:Olympic fencers of Russia Category:Fencers at the 1912 Summer Olympics
title: Gavriil Bertrain
